name: Sandshrew
flavorText:
Burrows deep
underground in
arid locations far from water.
It only emerges
to hunt for food.

previous.name: Raichu
previous.flavorText:
Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself
from its own high-voltage power.

next.name: Sandslash
next.flavorText:
Curls up into a
spiny ball when
threatened. It can roll while
curled up to
attack or escape.
